name: USD Coin (Arb1)
description: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. Every unit of this cryptocurrency in circulation is backed up by $1 that is held in reserve, in a mix of cash and short-term U.S. Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions.

en.description: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. Every unit of this cryptocurrency in circulation is backed up by $1 that is held in reserve, in a mix of cash and short-term U.S. Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions.

fr.description: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. Every unit of this cryptocurrency in circulation is backed up by $1 that is held in reserve, in a mix of cash and short-term U.S. Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions.

es.description: USD Coin es una moneda estable que está vinculada al dólar estadounidense en una base de 1:1. Cada unidad de esta criptomoneda en circulación está respaldada por $1 que se mantiene en reserva, en una combinación de efectivo y bonos del Tesoro de EE. UU. a corto plazo. El Centre consortium, que está detrás de este activo, dice que USDC es emitido por instituciones financieras reguladas.

de.description: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. Every unit of this cryptocurrency in circulation is backed up by $1 that is held in reserve, in a mix of cash and short-term U.S. Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions.

tr.description: USD coin, 1'e 1 temelinde ABD dolarına sabitlenmiş bir sabit paradır. Dolaşımdaki bu kripto para biriminin her birimi, nakit ve kısa vadeli ABD Hazine bonolarının bir karışımında yedekte tutulan 1 $ ile desteklenir. Bu varlığın arkasındaki Merkez konsorsiyumu, USDC'nin düzenlenmiş finansal kurumlar tarafından verildiğini söylüyor.

vi.description: USD Coin is a stablecoin that is pegged to the U.S. dollar on a 1:1 basis. Every unit of this cryptocurrency in circulation is backed up by $1 that is held in reserve, in a mix of cash and short-term U.S. Treasury bonds. The Centre consortium, which is behind this asset, says USDC is issued by regulated financial institutions.

zh.description: USDC 是以 1:1 比例来錨定美元价格的稳定币。每个 USDC 都有价值 $1 的储备资产作为支持，包括现金和短期美国国债等。USDC 背后的中心财团表示，USDC 是由受监管的金融机构发行的。

hi.description: USD कॉइन एक स्थिर मुद्रा है जो 1:1 के आधार पर U.S. डॉलर से आंकी जाती है। प्रचलन में इस क्रिप्टोकरेंसी की प्रत्येक इकाई को नकद और अल्पकालिक U.S. ट्रेजरी बॉन्ड के मिश्रण में $1 द्वारा समर्थित किया जाता है। केंद्र संघ, जो इस संपत्ति के पीछे है, का कहना है कि USDC विनियमित वित्तीय संस्थानों द्वारा जारी किया जाता है।
